body: The girl is just look like Stella Vermilion
Again, dumbass idiots not understanding that NTR has more meanings than just "stealing a loved one from the protagonist". This is NTR, plain and simple.

Not NTR, Not Cuckold, Like EvilRyo said this is just corruption pure and simple. Can't help but sigh in disappointment every time I see comments talking about NTR without the full understanding of how it works time and again.
:( if they take this manga from fairy tail or mahouka koukou then when the MC found out what happen that blonde guy gonna die

This wasn't too fucked up, still fucked up though. Painfully naive girl gets tricked and drugged. This could have been much longer. No true NTR took place, just corruption.  I wonder if there will be a continuation.
